name: Give me a break
description:
Give me a break

Submission to the Catalysts Summer Game Jam 2019, Theme: "A well timed pause"

 

Gameplay

In our game you have to manage a group of Cats working in an unnamed Catalysts Office for 365 days. If you don't give them enough breaks they will explode from too much stress.

There are 3 kinds of breaks:

  • Lunch breaks that decrease stress fast
  • Toilet breaks that give a big relief right away, but only very slowly over time
  • Vacation that gets rid of all stress in a fixed number of days

Cats generate Catcoins when they are working only, not during their breaks, and as soon as they survive for some time in the office, they become seniors (with awesome beards) and earn much more Catcoins for the company.
